name: Colorize Admin
author: cicophoto

sections.description:
This is a simple plugin that will make your wp admin panel theme much more pleasant for work. Using specific colours you improve your work surrounding and simple and clean design of your wp admin panel.

  • 30 color themes.
  • Tested with other popular plugins.
  • last update 8/5/2019

Video:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=usB0PPeEczw
sections.installation:
Here is the instruction:

  1. First download wpvote-colorize-admin.zip.
  2. Upload the “wpvote-colorize-admin.zip” from your admin panel.
  3. Then activate the plugin.
  4. Then go to your “Colorize Admin” and manage plugin.
sections.faq:
How to use

Using the addition is very easy. You just need to choose the colour you like and that’s it.

Note

We recommend not to use this plugin in combination with other similar plugins which change the admin themes. This plugin will most likely overwrite others or will be overwritten. You can’t use two similar plugins at the same time.

Support

For all additional questions and ideas you can contact us: http://www.wpvote.me/contact-us/
